WorkItem.Description: Dps value at the bottom of the screen is 12474, but I pull around 19.2k dps on target dummies with no buffs, food, or pots.  Simulationcraft estimates my dps at 18775, which I think is accurate if I extended my time attacking the dummy.
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] DW Frost DK DPS numerical value MUCH lower than in game

Comments.Message: Already fixed for next release with haste & partial procs changes.

I show your unbuffed DPS at 17.8k, and while it's not as cool as you're pulling now, it's MUCH closer.  I'll be working to improve the rotation stuff over the next few weeks after I knock out some other defects and finish fleshing out the T12 bosses.
